com.twilio4j.twism
Interface TranscribeParameters

public interface TranscribeParameters

Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'transcribeCallback' URL of Record.

Author:
broc.seib@gentomi.com

Method Detail

getTranscriptionText

java.lang.String getTranscriptionText()
Returns:
Contains the text of the transcription.

getTranscriptionStatus

TranscriptionStatus getTranscriptionStatus()
Returns:
The status of the transcription attempt: either 'completed' or 'failed'. These are enumerated in TranscriptionStatus.

getTranscriptionUrl

java.lang.String getTranscriptionUrl()
Returns:
The URL for the transcription's REST API resource.

getRecordingUrl

java.lang.String getRecordingUrl()
Returns:
The URL for the transcription's source recording resource.
